summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Tadka Pics Agent implementation. Backend functionality is fully working with 100% success rate. Frontend form is functional with proper validation messages for both Instagram URLs and embed codes.

design_issues.issue: Console error: 'setEditingMappings is not defined' when loading category prompt mappings
design_issues.impact: Does not affect core functionality but shows in console logs

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/ai-agents/{agent_id} - Successfully retrieves Tadka Pics agent
Backend: GET /api/ai-agents/{agent_id}/status - Returns correct agent status
Backend: POST /api/ai-agents/{agent_id}/run - Successfully creates gallery from Instagram carousel
Backend: Artist name extraction from Instagram (Dishapatani)
Backend: Image extraction from Instagram carousel (3 images)
Frontend: AI Agents page loads correctly at /cms/ai-agents
Frontend: Create AI Agent modal opens with agent type selection
Frontend: Tadka Pics Agent form loads with proper sections
Frontend: Instagram source type selection works
Frontend: Instagram URL textarea accepts both URLs and embed codes
Frontend: 'Instagram link detected' validation message appears for URLs
Frontend: 'Embed code detected' validation message appears for embed codes
Frontend: Form fields populate correctly (agent name, source type, content type, etc.)
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Resolve 'setEditingMappings is not defined' error in PostAgentForm component when fetching category prompt mappings. This is a non-critical console error that doesn't affect functionality.
